translation.ja: ジゼルのフェイスブックを

translation.en: Still nothing from Markie?
She's ignoring all my texts.
Her turn is next. I'm gonna try calling her again.
translation.ja: 次は彼女よ　電話してみる

translation.en: [Officer Chang] Brad?
-Brad! It's your father. -[sighs]
translation.ja: ブラッド　いるか？ 父さんだ

translation.en: Since Penelope, he's been...
I'll get rid of him.
Let's talk outside.
[Officer] I'm gonna grab a coffee.
Look, uh, I'm hearing some things about your friend's murder.
translation.ja: お前の友達が 殺された件だが⸺

translation.en: Kranis in homicide isn't convinced it's so simple.
translation.ja: クラニス刑事が 気にかかるそうだ

translation.en: I know I don't need to ask this, but... Is there something you're not telling us?
translation.ja: 任務だから質問するが 何か隠してないか？

translation.en: No, I promise. Everything we told you was true.
translation.ja: いいや　全部 話したよ

translation.en: Markie, thank God!
translation.ja: マーキー　よかった

translation.en: Why are you telling me all this?
'Cause I know Kranis is wrong, and I want you to know what's going on.
translation.ja: 私はクラニスが 間違ってると思う

translation.en: Look, you don't have to worry. I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
translation.ja: 心配するな 悪いようにはしない

translation.en: You're still my son, Brad.
You gonna get that?
Get what?
[voice on radio] Truth or dare, Brad?
translation.ja: ブラッド　真実か挑戦か？

translation.en: [Markie] Yeah, I guess I just needed some time alone.
No, no, no. It's fine. Just get here as fast as you can. And please be careful. Your turn's next.
translation.ja: 無事ならいいの 次は あなただから注意して

translation.en: I had my turn.
I chose truth.
So did Lucas.
And if the both of you picked truth...
[voice] You only have one choice.
translation.ja: お前には挑戦しかない

translation.en: You sure there's nothing you didn't tell me?
I dare you to steal his gun and make him beg for his life.
translation.ja: こいつから銃を奪って 命乞いさせてやれ

translation.en: Son?
Thank you, Dad, for everything.
translation.ja: 父さん　いろいろありがとう

translation.en: It's just, uh... There's just one more thing I need to do, and I hope you can forgive me.
translation.ja: 申し訳ないが １つ やるべきことがある

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Of course.
For what?
It's okay.
I need you to beg.
-For your life. -The hell are you doing?
translation.ja: 命乞いして　頼む 何のマネだ

translation.en: [Brad] Beg for your life!
translation.ja: 命乞いだ！ ブラッド　銃を下ろせ！

translation.en: Brad, please put the gun down!
translation.ja: ブラッド　銃を下ろせ！

translation.en: -Just do as I say... -You don't have to do this. ...or I'll die. Get on your knees.
translation.ja: やってくれないと死ぬ

translation.en: We have to go. Now!
Do as I say. I'll explain everything, okay?
-I know I've been hard on you. I'm sorry. -Listen. No!
translation.ja: 私が厳しすぎたようだ

translation.en: That's not what this is about.
Beg! Please, I'll explain everything. Just beg.
translation.ja: 父さん　命乞いだよ

translation.en: I guess you think I deserve this.
Just beg!
translation.ja: 違う　命乞いしてくれ

translation.en: Please! Just beg, and I'll put down the gun.
-What's that gonna prove, Brad? -Just beg!
translation.ja: なぜだ？ やれば銃を下ろすから…

translation.en: And I'll put down the gun! -Beg-- -[gun fires]
translation.ja: やれば銃を下ろすから…

translation.en: [Olivia] Brad!
Brad, no, no, no. No!
translation.ja: ブラッド　しっかりしろ

translation.en: Get a paramedic.
Brad! Brad! No, no, no. Stay here. You're gonna be fine.
translation.ja: ブラッド　死んじゃダメだぞ

translation.en: No! No!
I need a paramedic. Help!
I need a paramedic! Brad!
[Markie] I'm so sorry.
Guys, can we get out of here?
I still need to talk to the detective.
-I shouldn't have picked truth. -[Lucas] No.
translation.ja: 私のせいね いいや　俺も真実を選んで⸺

translation.en: It's not your fault. I picked truth, too.
translation.ja: いいや　俺も真実を選んで⸺

translation.en: We shouldn't have left Brad alone.
No, it wouldn't have mattered.
translation.ja: 関係ないわ このゲームは すごく賢い

translation.en: This game is smart. It's too smart. We're not playing it.
translation.ja: 関係ないわ このゲームは すごく賢い 私たちは完全に遊ばれてる

translation.en: It's playing us. And none of this is a coincidence.
translation.ja: 私たちは完全に遊ばれてる

translation.en: It waits for our most vulnerable moments, and that's when it asks us.
translation.ja: こっちの心の隙を突いて 質問してくるの

translation.en: [in distorted voice] Yeah, you got that right, Olivia.
translation.ja: オリヴィア　正解だ

translation.en: And now it's your turn.
Truth or dare?
What?
What is it?
Lucas just asked me.
[in normal voice] No, I didn't.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Olivia?
[Markie] Okay. Okay, you have to pick truth.
translation.ja: オリヴィア　真実を選んで

translation.en: Olivia, do it.
-Dare. -[Markie] Olivia.
I dare you
to tell Markie the secret you fear most.
translation.ja: お前が一番 恐れてる秘密を

translation.en: What? What is it making you do?
Markie, there's something important I need to tell you.
translation.ja: マーキー　大事な話がある

translation.en: I was there the night your dad died. I know what happened.
translation.ja: お父さんが亡くなった夜 私もいた

translation.en: What?
What are you talking about?
I had gotten into a fight with my parents, so I went to your house.
translation.ja: 両親とケンカして あなたの家に行ったの

translation.en: You weren't there, so your dad let me in.
translation.ja: あなたは留守で お父さんがいた

translation.en: He was drinking, and he offered me one, so I took it.
translation.ja: お酒を飲んでて 私にも勧めてくれたわ

translation.en: We had a few, and then he told me that he had been fired that day
translation.ja: 何杯か飲んだあと 解雇されたと言われた

translation.en: 'cause he was drinking on the job. And I just... I felt really bad for him. [sniffles]
translation.ja: 勤務中の飲酒でね 私は気の毒に思ったわ

translation.en: But I told him that you and I would help him figure things out.
translation.ja: “マーキーと一緒に 力になるわ”と言ったら…

translation.en: And then he called me beautiful.
I was drunk, and I didn't know what to do, and then he leaned in to kiss me...
translation.ja: 酔ってて焦ったけど⸺ キスされそうになって 彼を押し返した

translation.en: I tried to push him off. I didn't do it, but he...
translation.ja: キスされそうになって 彼を押し返した

translation.en: [sniffles] He kept coming back stronger. Finally, I got free.
translation.ja: すると強く迫ってきたわ でも私は振り切った

translation.en: He begged me to forgive him,
translation.ja: “許してくれ”と 謝られたけど⸺

translation.en: said that he needed help, but I was so scared,
translation.ja: “許してくれ”と 謝られたけど⸺ 私は取り乱して “マーキーに話す”と言った

translation.en: and I was confused. And I threatened to tell you what happened,
translation.ja: 私は取り乱して “マーキーに話す”と言った

translation.en: but he said that he would die if you ever found out.
translation.ja: すると “娘に話したら死ぬ”って

translation.en: I told him that you'd be better off if he were dead.
translation.ja: 私は“そのほうがいいかも”と

translation.en: Markie, I am so sorry.
translation.ja: マーキー　ごめんなさい

translation.en: I wanted to tell you, but by the time I got a hold of you,
translation.ja: 話したかったけど⸺ あなたに連絡を取る前に 亡くなった

translation.en: he had already done it, and you were devastated.
translation.ja: あなたに連絡を取る前に 亡くなった

translation.en: It broke my heart. I didn't know what to do. Trust me. I--
translation.ja: 私も苦しんだわ　信じて…

translation.en: No. No, I'll never trust you again. Markie.
translation.ja: イヤよ　二度と信じない

translation.en: Don't!
Don't.
[Kranis] Miss Barron,
you're up.
[Kranis] "I know the game dared you to set that woman on fire.
translation.ja: “火をつけろと 命令されたんでしょ？”

translation.en: Tell me where to meet you, or I'll wait outside your family's house
translation.ja: “会える場所を教えて でないと実家で待つ”

translation.en: until the game dares me to do the same to them."
That is quite a threat.
We traced the IP to your laptop.
[stammers] I know that that looks bad,
translation.ja: 表現がマズかったのは 認めますが⸺

translation.en: but I just needed to get her attention.
translation.ja: 彼女の興味を引きたくて…

translation.en: Yeah, I know you're playing some kind of truth or dare game, but what I don't understand is, why are people dying?
translation.ja: “真実か挑戦か？”って ゲームで なぜ人が死ぬ？

translation.en: There's only four of you left. I'd like to keep the rest of you guys alive.
translation.ja: 生存者が４人だけなんて

translation.en: Four?
Everyone who's dead was in Mexico.
translation.ja: 死亡者はメキシコに行ってた

translation.en: That leaves you, Markie and Lucas, and Giselle's friend, Sam Meehan.
translation.ja: 死亡者はメキシコに行ってた 生存者は君たち３人と サムだけ

translation.en: Sam? Wait. He's alive?
translation.ja: サム？　彼は生きてるの？

translation.en: You know him?
No. No. [stammering] That's just someone that Giselle had mentioned.
translation.ja: いいえ　ジゼルから 名前を聞いただけよ

translation.en: He's holed up in an apartment. Won't talk to anybody.
translation.ja: アパートに引きこもってる

translation.en: Said I had to arrest him if I wanted to speak to him again.
translation.ja: 逮捕でもしないと 彼とは話せない

translation.en: Olivia, what the hell is happening here?
translation.ja: オリヴィア 一体 どうなってる？

translation.en: Could I get some water, please?
Thanks.
Am I being charged?
Not yet.
Okay. Then I need to go.
translation.ja: よかった　行かないと

translation.en: Carter is Sam. He was using a fake name.
translation.ja: カーターがサムよ 偽名を使ってた

translation.en: But Giselle acted like they were different people?
Well, she was probably trying to protect him, but she slipped up, and she used his real name. Come on.
translation.ja: ジゼルは うっかり本名を漏らしたのよ

translation.en: Markie?
Markie?
Markie!
Markie, please open the door. We need to talk.
translation.ja: ドアを開けて　話がある

translation.en: What are you doing?
What my father did.
Markie, please put it down.
[sobs] Why?
I don't have anything.
You have me.
No. -No, the game has us. -[cocks gun]
translation.ja: でも ゲームに支配されてる

translation.en: I hid the truth about your dad to protect you.
translation.ja: あなたを守りたくて 黙ってたけど⸺

translation.en: But I was wrong.
Every single day, I wish I could take back what I said to him.
translation.ja: お父さんへの言葉を 毎日 後悔してる

translation.en: He tried before.
It's not your fault.
We can't change the past.
But we can still have a future. We can end this game.
translation.ja: でもゲームは終わらせられる

translation.en: How?
Carter. I know where he is.
Okay, so what's the plan?
We just have to get him back to the mission.
Okay, so don't open with, "We need you to cut out your own tongue"?
translation.ja: “舌を切って”は あとにしてね

translation.en: Here it is. Six.
[Carter] Go away! I don't wanna talk to anyone.
translation.ja: 帰れ！　誰とも話さない

translation.en: Screw this.
-You... -[Olivia] Carter!
Or is it Sam?
-How did you find me? -We were motivated.
translation.ja: なぜここが？ 捜したわ

translation.en: -What the hell happened in here? -The game.
No contact with the outside. Nothing in here can hurt me.
translation.ja: ゲームだ　外に出なければ 傷つけられない

translation.en: This is your plan?
My plan is to wait it out.
No, that was your second plan. Your first plan was to screw us.
translation.ja: 待つのが対策だと？ 俺たちをハメたくせに

translation.en: Three of my best friends are dead because of you!
I'm sorry. I lost friends, too, okay? If I could take it all back, I would.
translation.ja: 俺も友達を失って つらい思いをしてる

translation.en: There is a way. But we all have to go back to the mission.
translation.ja: 教会に戻れば終わらせられる

translation.en: A way to what? To what, end the game? How?
Just trust me.
translation.ja: お願い　私を信じて

translation.en: We have to go back.
Uh-uh... No, this is another dare, right?
translation.ja: いいや　これは挑戦だろ

translation.en: The game is daring you to lure me out. -Is that-- -No.
She's telling the truth.
And why should I trust you?
Because we want the same thing. We wanna survive.
translation.ja: 望みは同じはずよ 生き残りたいでしょ

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you what you should have told me at the bar.
translation.ja: 俺にバーで言うべきだった

translation.en: Piss off.
Okay, sweet, little Olivia's not shooting anyone.
translation.ja: 優しい君には撃てない

translation.en: Try me. I dare you.
translation.ja: どうかしら　挑戦するわ

translation.en: Is this ritual that old nun told you about actually gonna work?
[Olivia] There's only one way to find out.
So we're gonna end this with a seance?
[Olivia] We are not ending it. You are.
translation.ja: あなたが終わらせるのよ

translation.en: Me? I tried.
[chuckles] We all know how that turned out.
-Stay down. -[coughs]
Here, take this. Take it.
translation.ja: ほら　これを持って

translation.en: Say it seven times.
What are you gonna do with that?
I'm giving it to you.
Take it now!
Now say the words seven times.
Go!
Did you feel that?
[Olivia] Don't stop.
-Just tell me what's going on! -Keep going!
translation.ja: どうなってる？ 続けて！

translation.en: Say it again.
Five more times.
[in distorted voice] Truth or dare, Lucas?
Dare.
-Where are you going? -Just gotta get away from here.
Wait, wait, wait!
You can't go. Your turn's next.
translation.ja: ダメよ　次はあなた

translation.en: I just had my turn.
-Gotta get away from you both. -Why?
translation.ja: 君たち２人から離れる なぜ？

translation.en: Because it dared me to choose.
You already have. You love Markie!
Choose which one of you to kill.
What, so he's just leaving?
Don't stop. Two more times.
[Markie] Luke! Luke!
Why did you pick dare?
Because I knew if I didn't, then one of you would have to.
And we're so close. And I won't let the game kill you.
translation.ja: もうすぐだ 死んでほしくない

translation.en: You're such an idiot.
What can I say?
You do that to me.
That's seven. We gotta get out of here. This place is coming down.
No, there's one more thing to do.
Pick up the knife.
I can't do it for you.
Pick it up!
And do what?
I'm so sorry, Sam. But you unleashed this evil, which means you're the only one who can stop it.
translation.ja: 悪魔を解放した者だけが やめさせることができる

translation.en: I need you to cut out your tongue.
No! That's insane.
Please! It's the only way we survive.
You take care of each other.
[Olivia] Do it.
Lucas, stop!
That's not Lucas.
Do it now, Carter! -[rumbling] -Before it's too late.
translation.ja: カーター　手遅れになるわよ

translation.en: Don't you wanna live?
You do not have a choice! Do it!
I can't believe I'm about to do this.
translation.ja: こんなことになるとは

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I will murder everyone you've ever known.
No! They are not in this. It's just us!
translation.ja: ゲームの参加者は 私たちだけよ

translation.en: You're right. But Lucas is. And he didn't do his dare.
translation.ja: ルーカスは 挑戦を果たしてない

translation.en: So now he dies.
Lucas refused his dare to save us.
translation.ja: 私たちを守ってくれた

translation.en: We have to finish this.
[Markie] Calux killed Carter. The spell won't work.
translation.ja: カーターも死んだ もう呪文は効かない

translation.en: No, we lost the second we started this game.
translation.ja: ゲームを始めた時点で⸺

translation.en: The second we came here.
Carter was dared to bring us here because this is where you can add new people to the game.
translation.ja: ここでなら参加者を増やせる

translation.en: I have an idea. Your turn's next. When you're asked, I need you to pick dare.
translation.ja: いい考えがあるわ 挑戦を選んでほしい

translation.en: Why would I do that?
[Lucas, in distorted voice] Markie...
Truth or dare?
[sobbing] Now Lucas is asking me.
Pick dare. But don't do it.
translation.ja: 挑戦を選び 果たさないで

translation.en: What? I'll die!
Markie,
I am so sorry for keeping that secret from you for so long.
translation.ja: 長い間 隠し事をしてごめんね

translation.en: And I swear to you I will never ever keep anything from you again.
translation.ja: 二度と隠し事はしないと誓う

translation.en: But we survive this only if we trust each other. Okay?
translation.ja: 私たちが助かる道は 信じ合うことだけよ

translation.en: Okay.
Trust me.
[Lucas] You have to pick.
Dare.
I dare you to shoot Olivia.
translation.ja: オリヴィアを銃で撃て

translation.en: He wants me to shoot you.
You gotta trust me, Markie. Don't do it.
This is the only way to save us both.
Okay. I trust you.
translation.ja: 分かった　あなたを信じるわ

translation.en: I won't do it.
Dare complete, Calux.
Your turn. Truth or dare?
translation.ja: ケイラックス 真実か挑戦か？

translation.en: [in distorted voice] I'm not in this game.
No, once you're asked, you're in. Those are the rules, right?
translation.ja: 質問されたら参加者よ ルールでしょ

translation.en: So truth or dare, asshole?
Truth.
How do we get out of this game alive?
translation.ja: ゲームを抜ける方法は？

translation.en: You can't. Carter was the only one who could stop this.
translation.ja: 無理よ　止められるのは カーターだけだった

translation.en: So now the game won't end until all the players are dead.
translation.ja: 参加者全員がくたばるまで ゲームは続く

translation.en: And your turn's next.
Unless you find some new friends to play with.
translation.ja: 新しい参加者を入れなきゃ

translation.en: But that's not gonna happen, is it?
[in normal voice] Your arm.
I'm okay.
Well, did it work?
It's not over. The game will never end, not as long as we're alive.
translation.ja: 終わらなかったわ 私たちがいる限り続く

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm choosing you.
[Olivia on video] My friends and I went on a trip to Mexico for spring break.
translation.ja: 春休みに 友達とメキシコに行った

translation.en: We ended up in an old mission where we played a game of truth or dare.
translation.ja: 古い教会で “真実か挑戦か？”をやった

translation.en: We had no idea that we had encountered an unspeakable evil that wanted to play with us.
translation.ja: まさか 悪魔と ゲームをしてたとはね

translation.en: When we went home, the game kept going.
translation.ja: 家に帰っても ゲームは続いてた

translation.en: It killed five of my friends.
The game is real.
Tell the truth, do the dare, or you die. Refuse to play, you die. It can happen anywhere.
translation.ja: 真実を言わないと死に 挑戦を拒否しても死ぬ

translation.en: And it can come from anyone.
translation.ja: 誰からでも起こり得るわ

translation.en: I'm so sorry, but I have to ask you.
translation.ja: 申し訳ないけど質問させて

translation.en: Truth or dare?
